description: A Flutter screen widget for admin user management in a healthy meal ordering platform. It includes UI components like headers, list items, and styling related to theme and responsiveness.

classes.name: AdminUsersManagementScreen
classes.description: StatelessWidget representing the admin user management screen with a scaffold containing app bar and list view.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A custom widget for displaying section headers with icon and gradient background.

classes.name: _Lined
classes.description: A widget that displays a styled list item with an icon and descriptive text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main scaffold of the admin user management screen, including app bar and list items.

methods.name: _Header.build
methods.description: Constructs the header widget with gradient background, icon, and title.

methods.name: _Lined.build
methods.description: Constructs a styled list item with icon and text.
